/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. A white car is parked on the right side of the street, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. On the left side of the street, there's a building with a blue sign, its color contrasting with the greenery around it. The image is taken during the day, and the sunlight illuminates the scene, casting shadows and highlighting the colors.
